Day 1, Sunday April 15th

Time Task
3:00-3:45 Arrival & Poster Setup
4:00-5:30 Welcome & Power-Pitch Research Session 1 ​(moderators: Yan Li & Galateia Kazakia)
4:00-4:15 Metabolic imaging of infection using PET and Hyperpolarized 13C MR spectroscopy - David Wilson
4:15-4:30 Multimodality NeuroImaging to track Alzheimer disease pathology spread - Duygu Tosun
4:45-5:30 Detection of Bone Marrow Lesions Using Dual Energy CT - Ramya Srinivasan
5:30-6:30 Get-to-know-your-colleagues (moderators: Maryam Vareth, Caroline Jordan & Sue Noworolski)
6:30-8:00 Dinner
7:15-7:45 Overview of Department Research Enterprise & Future Visions - Christopher Hess & Sharmila Majumdar
8:00-10:30 Poster Session Group I & Reception
